com.epam.jwd.task01.logic

Class NecklaceCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.jwd.task01.logic.NecklaceCreator

  • public class NecklaceCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Base method to add into list Necklace instances of Gemstone from source list GemstoneList

    Each Necklace is based on Arraylist collection and able to use all relevant methods.

    Elements to add into Necklace have some restrictions:

    a) an attempt to duplicate already added element throws IllegalArgumentException;

    b) an attempt to add non-existent element from GemstoneList throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

    See Also:
    GemstoneListCreator, ArrayList

    • Constructor Detail

      • NecklaceCreator

        public NecklaceCreator()
        Constructor to create an instance of Necklace, based on empty Arraylist.

        Each initialised Necklace has a unique ID, which is generated automatically by incrementing of static field id by one from zero initial value (set by default).

    • Method Detail

      • getNecklace

        public java.util.List<Gemstone> getNecklace()

      • getNecklaceId

        public int getNecklaceId()

      • addGemstoneToNecklace

        public void addGemstoneToNecklace(GemstoneListCreator gemstoneList,
                                  int gemstoneId)
        Adds element from GemstoneList into Necklace

        In case of trying to duplicate already added element throws IllegalArgumentException. This check is performed by comparing of field gemstoneId in new element with the corresponding fields of previously added elements.

        In case of trying to add non-existent element from GemstoneList (non-existent Arraylist index) throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

        Parameters:
        gemstoneList - an instance of GemstoneList, created by GemstoneListCreator
        gemstoneId - a value of field stoneId of an instance of Gemstone

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
